Name: Repealing the undue hardship exception to the after hours construction prohibition.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to repealing the undue hardship exception to the after hours construction prohibition.

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Environmental Protection
This Introduction was Sine Die (Filed, End of Session)

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

Section 1. Paragraph 5 of subdivision e of section 24-223 of the administrative code of the city of New York as amended by local law number 113 for the year 2005 is REPEALED.
Â§2. This local law shall take effect immediately upon its enactment.
JTB
LS #2511
3/7/07
